name: Wright Philip
description: I am a very honest, sincere, and loyal man. Guilty of giving more than my share towards a relationship and expect the same in return. I would like to spend time with that special woman and enjoying each others company as friends first… getting to know each other. I’m an easy going yet focused guy always willing to lend a hand. Amidst all the turmoil this life has to offer, I prefer to keep an optimistic outlook. I try to enjoy every moment and strive to keep balance in life. I enjoy getting out in this world and explore everything it has to offer. I consider myself as a caring, romantic highly intelligent, sincere, hardworking,I’m honest, loyal, good listener well I enjoy watching Tv, and interesting movies. I enjoy my life and my situation and am looking forward to sharing my life with some one special.
